ingrisin eemata pera lankawa yanuwen "rajyayak" nopawathina.thibune ekinekata hudekalawa palanaya wu wadawasam rajadhani kihipayaki."api lankikayo" yana sawignyanikathwaya ewakata nothibuna athara "api kande rajjaye yatath wasso","api yapana rajadhaniye aya" aadi washayen rajadhanimaya manasikathwayaki ewakata pawathune.lankawa awurudu 2500k pura "eekiya" rajyayak lesa pawathina yanna amuma amu pralapayaki."eekiya" rajyaya wu kali uthpaththiyenma yuropa dhaneshwara sankalpayaki.dhanawadaya kiyana samaja kramaya eemata pera lankawe nowa lokaye kothanakawath "eekiya" rajyaya yanuwen deyak thibune naha.thibune pradesha padanama uda wisirila sakas wuna wadawasam rajadhani pamani.
me awasthawehi ratata awashyayenma thibiya yuthu deshapalana nayakathwaya nomathi wimada rate awasanawaki.

ehi kawara aayojakayeku sitiya da chithrapata pilibanda sampurna awasan thiranaya darana ladde himansu rayi wisini.emenma rayi samanga ‘layit of eeshiya‘ chithrapataya nipadawannata ekwuna frans ostan athulu jarmanu thakshana shilpin da bombe tokis samagamata ek wu heyin emagin indiyanu tharuna pirisakata owun yatathe puhunuwa labime awasthawa himi wuha.kamara shilpi joshaf warshlin, pasuthala nirmana shilpi kal won spre ostan menma eyata dayaka wu jarmanuwan wu athara, brithanya jathikayan wu len hatli shabda paripalana shilpiya lesada, sol le rasayanagara adhipathi lesada eyata ek wiya.himansu rayige thira nataka rachakaya wu niranjan pal da landanaya harada ehi paminiye thira nataka rachakaya hatiyataya.meki pirisa wisin bihi karana lada indiyanu sinama thakshana shilpin paramparawen paramparawata siya danuma beda ganimin, ada da hindi sinamawe katayuthu kirima ‘bombe tokis‘ indiyanu sinamawata kala balapamata nidasunaki.samagame mulma chithrapataya1935 wasare thanuna ‘jawani ki hawa‘ chithrapatayayi.

pasal wishaya nirdeshaya - ladaru pasalmontisori / ladaru pasal pasal wishaya nirdeshaya - 1 sita 5 shreniyajathyanthara pasal wishaya nirdeshaya - 1 sita 5 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisaraya bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya siyaluma wishayan sinhala bhashawa saukhyaya ha sharirika adhyapanaya hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 1 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisaraya bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya siyaluma wishayan sinhala bhashawa hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 2 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisaraya bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya siyaluma wishayan sinhala bhashawa hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 3 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisaraya bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya siyaluma wishayan sinhala bhashawa hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 4 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisaraya bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya siyaluma wishayan sinhala bhashawa hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 5 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisaraya bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya siyaluma wishayan sinhala bhashawa saukhyaya ha sharirika adhyapanaya hindu dharmaya pasal wishaya nirdeshaya - 6 sita 9 shreniyajathyanthara pasal wishaya nirdeshaya - 6 sita 9 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya krida / sharirika adhyapanaya ganithaya chithra kalawa demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisarika adhyapanaya buddhagama bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya siyaluma wishayan sinhala bhashawa saukhyaya ha sharirika adhyapanaya hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 6 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya chithra kalawa demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisarika adhyapanaya purawasi adhyapanaya buddhagama bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya sinhala bhashawa saukhyaya ha sharirika adhyapanaya hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 7 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya chithra kalawa demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisarika adhyapanaya buddhagama bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya sinhala bhashawa saukhyaya ha sharirika adhyapanaya hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 8 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya chithra kalawa jiwana nipunatha ha purawasi adhyapanaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisarika adhyapanaya buddhagama bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya saukhyaya ha sharirika adhyapanaya hindu dharmaya deshiya wishaya nirdeshaya - 9 shreniyaarabi bhashawa ingrisi ithihasaya islam dharmaya ganithaya ginumkaranaya chithra kalawa jiwana nipunatha ha purawasi adhyapanaya demala bhashawa pariganaka thakshanaya parisarika adhyapanaya buddhagama bhugola widyawa widyawa sangithaya samaja adhyanaya saukhyaya ha sharirika adhyapanaya hindu dharmaya pasal wishaya nirdeshaya -
